DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this observational study is to describe radiological, clinical and histological characteristics of women with infiltrative breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: National Survey on Infiltrative Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Women> or = 18 years old Women with newly diagnosis of infiltrative breast cancer Agree to take part in this study Women with other malignant tumor (except in situ cervical carcinoma or treated basal cell carcinoma) Women with in situ ductal carcinoma or in situ lobular carcinoma
